title: Request Updated Supplier Catalog
description: A supplier has released their new catalog for the year. A procurement manager needs to get the new catalog and update the system.

tasks.description: Contact the supplier to request their new product catalog and price list.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sends an email to the supplier.

tasks.description: Receive the new catalog file from the supplier.
tasks.expected_outcome: The supplier sends the new catalog as a spreadsheet.

tasks.description: Upload the new catalog to the system, updating existing products and adding new ones.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully updates the company's product database with the new supplier information.
